FuncDef:
The arp detect times command sets the aging probe times of dynamic ARP entries.
The undo arp detect times command restores the default setting. The arp detect times command sets the aging probe times of dynamic ARP entries. The undo arp detect times command restores the default setting. By default, the aging probe times of dynamic ARP entries is 3.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the aging probe times of dynamic ARP entries.
The value is an integer ranging from 0 to 10.

ExtraInfo: The arp detect times command sets the aging probe times of dynamic ARP entries to reduce address resolution errors. Before aging a dynamic ARP entry, the system performs ARP probe. If the system does not receive any response after the number of probe times reaches the upper limit, the system deletes the ARP entry.
